name: Auto Approve Bot
description: This is a telegram bot to approve your requests automatically.

API_ID.description: Your API_ID, Get it from https://my.telegram.org/

API_HASH.description: Your API_HASH, Get it from https://my.telegram.org/

DATABASE_URL.description: Mongodb token for saving the users data

LOG_CHANNEL.description: A telegram channel id starting with -100 to send loggings

OWNER_ID.description: auth users who have check bot status and can broadcast.
